product_name: MOON Take A Hike: Los Angeles
long_description: Filled with 75 hidden gems within a 2 hour drive of downtown, MOON Take a Hike: Los Angeles points the way to natural sanctuaries where you can catch your breath away from the urban landscape.
short_description: Filled with 75 hidden gems within a 2 hour drive of downtown, MOON Take a Hike: Los Angeles points the way to natural sanctuaries where you can catch your breath away from the urban landscape.
